item.title: Accelerating Blockwise Parallel Language Models with Draft Refinement
item.description: Boost LLM inference speed by 3x! This paper refines blockwise parallel decoding (BPD) by cleverly refining draft predictions, resulting in faster text generation for large language models.

item.title: Aligning to Thousands of Preferences via System Message Generalization
item.description: JANUS, a 7B LLM, achieves high alignment to thousands of user preferences by generalizing from diverse system messages, outperforming existing LLMs on various benchmarks.

item.title: Preference Alignment with Flow Matching
item.description: Preference Flow Matching (PFM) streamlines preference integration into pre-trained models using flow matching, overcoming fine-tuning limitations and enabling robust alignment with human preferences.
